title: Microsoft Teams will soon be available on the Microsoft Store for Windows 11 and 10
content:
Microsoft will soon be releasing Teams on the Microsoft Store, making it easier for users to download and install the communication app. Currently, the only way to download the “classic” version of Teams is to go to the official website, but that could change as soon as next month. When we say “classic”, we’re referring

The post Microsoft Teams will soon be available on the Microsoft Store for Windows 11 and 10 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is gearing up to release Teams on the Microsoft Store soon, according to its roadmap. The app will work on Windows 10 and 11.
